name: Young-joo Shin
content: COMPUTER SYSTEMS SECURITY LABSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationCOMPUTER SYSTEMS SECURITY LAB Latest NewsOur paper authored by Hyerean Jang, Taehun Kim, and Youngjoo Shin has been accepted to Black Hat Europe 2024.We won the top prize at the Cybersecurity Paper Competition 2024 with our paper "SysBumps: Exploiting Speculative Execution in System Calls for Breaking KASLR in macOS for Apple Silicon".Our paper authored by Hyerean Jang, Taehun Kim, and Youngjoo Shin has been accepted to ACM CCS 2024. Our paper "Deep Learning based Detection for Multiple Cache Side-channel Attacks" has been accepted to IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics and Security (TIFS) (IF=6.8)Computer Systems Security Lab, School of Cybersecurity, Korea UniversityRobot Convergence Bld.
